Package com.salesforce.multicloudj.pubsub.client

Class TopicClient

java.lang.Object
com.salesforce.multicloudj.pubsub.client.TopicClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class TopicClient extends Object implements AutoCloseable
High-level client for publishing messages to a pubsub topic. TopicClient provides a simplified interface for sending messages to cloud pubsub queue/topic in a provider-agnostic way. It handles batching, retries, and error conversion automatically.

  • Method Details

    • builder

      public static TopicClient.TopicClientBuilder builder(String providerId)
      Creates a new TopicClientBuilder for the specified provider.
      Parameters:
      providerId - The cloud provider identifier (e.g., "aws", "gcp", "ali")
      Returns:
      A new TopicClientBuilder instance

    • send

      public void send(Message message)
      Sends a single message to the topic.

      This method will block until the message is successfully sent or an error occurs. Messages are automatically batched by the underlying driver for efficiency.

      Parameters:
      message - The message to send
      Throws:
      SubstrateSdkException - If the send operation fails

    • close

      public void close() throws Exception
      Implements AutoCloseable interface for try-with-resources support. Shuts down the topic client and releases all resources. After calling this method, no more messages can be sent through this client. Any pending messages will be flushed before shutdown completes. It's safe to call this method multiple times.
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
      Throws:
      SubstrateSdkException - If the shutdown operation fails
      Exception
